recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.ingredients: Pizza Dough, Pepperoni, Mozzarella cheese, Tomato sauce
recipes.instructions: Flatten dough ball, and stretch out into a round. Brush dough top with olive oil. Sprinkle pizza peel with corn meal, put flattened dough on top. Spread with tomato sauce and sprinkle with toppings. Bake pizza.

recipes.title: Fish Soup
recipes.instructions: Make the soup base. Prepare fish and vegetables. Make the fish soup.

recipes.title: Bacon Wrapped Asparagus
recipes.instructions: Prep asparagus by trimming and discarding the lower ends of each spear. Wrap each bacon slice with some asparagus. Brush vegetables with olive oil. Bake at preheated oven of 200°C.

recipes.title: Garlic-Butter Steak
recipes.instructions: Sprinkle steak with salt and pepper. In a large skillet, heat remaining butter over medium heat. Add steak, cook until meat reaches desired doneness.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.ingredients: 1 pound of beef, 2 teaspoons herbes de Provence, 2 cups beef broth, 3 cups cubed peeled potatoes
recipes.instructions: Add beef, a few pieces at a time, and toss beef and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Stir in tomato paste, herbes de Provence and garlic. Add potatoes, onions and carrots. Cover; simmer until meat and vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes longer.

recipes.title: Spicy Moroccan Carrot Salad
recipes.instructions: Prepare the carrots. Blanch the carrots in the boiling water until tender when pierced with a knife, about 3 minutes. Crisscross the carrots on a platter. Scatter the micro greens and almonds on top and season with flaked sea salt.

recipes.title: Sea Urchin Guacamole Tacos
recipes.ingredients: 36 sea urchin tongues, 3 canned minced chipotle chilies, 12 tortillas, 60 cilantro leaves
recipes.instructions: Lay out the warm tortillas on serving plates. Place a few tablespoons of the sea urchin guacamole on each tortilla and evenly distribute the 48 urchin tongues among the tacos.

recipes.title: Peeping Mushroom Pasta
recipes.ingredients: 9 ounces rigatoni pasta, 3 1/2 ounces Gruyère cheese, 6 ounces mixed enoki or shimeji mushrooms
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Bring a stockpot of salted water to a boil. Put the pasta in the water and cook for 2 minutes less than the package instructions say. Drain the pasta and arrange the rigatoni pieces upright tightly in four ovenproof dishes; they will look a bit like honeycomb. Pour the sauce over the pasta. Tap the base of the baking dishes to allow the sauce to get between the holes, spooning more on if necessary. Place the mushroom stalks into the rigatoni holes, leaving the caps poking out. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the cheese is golden and bubbling. Serve with a sprinkle of finely chopped parsley on top.
